attributes.action: Persuade Health and Transport to cooperate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure that the departments for health and transport realise that joind up government involves their cooperation. That hospital and other health centres must be reachable. Thus when for example facilities are concentrated on a larger hospital for example the University Hospital Coventry, there must be adequate public transport from and to the hinterlands of the hospitals those facilities are moved from,for examole in the case of the University Hosputal Coventry, from Nuneaton, Warwick, Leamington and Stratford upon Avon and the Concentation us NOT viable if the economics do not allow the necedssary subsidies to the relevant local auithorities and bus companies
